PHRASE.LANG: This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Against All Odds Award" for winning a 200 to 1 bet. [#Legal]
Ce trophée est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. Il s'agit de la "Against All Odds Award" que vous obtenez pour gagner un pari de 200 à 1. [#Legal]
This trophy is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Against All Odds Award" for winning a 200 to 1 bet. [#Legal]
